SourceText: Be gentle with yourself @fields.user_name. Just because something didn’t go well today, or you lost your temper, this doesn’t define who you are as a parent. Remind yourself of the things you did well today, even if they may seem small.
text: Ungazihluleli @fields.user_name. Ngenxa yokuthi kukhona okungahambanga kahle namhlanje, noma wenze okuthile ngenxa yentukuthelo, lokhu akukuchazi ukuthi ungumzali onjani. Zikhumbuze ngezinto ozenze kahle namhlanje , noma ngabe zibonakala zizincane.

SourceText: You don’t have to do this alone! Please feel free to share your ParentText journey with other adults in your household and elsewhere. They might want to sign up to receive the messages too!
text: Akumele ukwenze uwedwa lokhu! Khululeka ngokutshela abanye abantu abadala emndenini wakho kanye nanoma yikuphi ngohambo lwakho lwe-ParentText. Kungenzeka nabo bathande ukujoyina ukuze nabo bathole imiyalezo!

SourceText: It can be much more fun doing something with another person than doing it by yourself.
text: Kungaba mnandi ukwenza okuthile ngokuhlanganyela nabanye abantu kunokuba ukwenze wedwa.

text: Ungathanda yini ukuthola ilinki yalolu hlelo, ukuze ukwazi ukuyinikeza umngane wakho?

SourceText: If you have already noticed some changes in your life or relationship with your children, that's great!
text: Uma selukhona ushintsho olubonayo empilweni yakho noma ebudlelwaneni bakho nezingane zakho., kungaba kuhle kakhulu lokho!

SourceText: If you have not noticed any changes, please keep it up. Sometimes these things take time to change. We know you can do it!
text: Uma lukhona ushintsho olubonayo, qhubeka nokwenza kahle. Kwesinye isikhathi lezi zinto zithatha isikhathi ukushintsha. Siyazi ukuthi ungakwenza lokhu!

SourceText: If you have not noticed any changes, please keep it up. Sometimes these things take time to change. I know you can do it!
text: Uma lukhona ushintsho olubonayo, qhubeka nokwenza kahle. Kwesinye isikhathi lezi zinto zithatha isikhathi ukushintsha. Ngiyazi ukuthi ungakwenza lokhu!

SourceText: It can be exhausting when your children have too much energy or can't focus on one thing. Sometimes, your children need opportunities to be very active and run around to help them be calm afterwards.
text: Kukhathaza kakhulu uma izingane zakho zinentshisekelo enkulu kakhulu kodwa zibe zingakwazi ukugxila entweni eyodwa. Kwezinye izikhathi, izingane zakho zidinga amathuba okuyaluza kakhulu futhi zigijime yonke indawo ukuze zikwazi ukuba nokuthula engqondweni.

SourceText: Would you like suggestions for active and calm things to do with your child?
text: Ingabe uyawafuna amayelana nezinto ongazenza nengane yakho zokwenza ingane yakho ikwazi ukuyaluza iphinde ikwazi ukuba nokuthula engqondweni?

SourceText: Remember that you’re in charge of what they eat, but not how much. Newborns have stomach the size of a grape! They need to eat often (sometimes in the middle of the night). It’s important to build trust around eating, especially as your baby starts on solid food. Let them know you are listening to their wishes in the eating department. They’ll be ravenous again soon!
text: Khumbula ukuthi kukuwe ukuthi udlani, kodwa hhayi ukuthi udla kangakanani. Izingane ezisandakuzalwa zinesisu esingangegilebhisi! Kudingeka ukuthi zidle njalo (kwesinye isikhathi zidle nasebusuku imbala). Kubalulekile ukwakha ukwethembana uma kuziwa ekudleni, ikakhulukazi uma ingane yakho iqala ukudla okuqinile. Benze baqonde ukuthi uyazilalela izifiso zabo uma kuziwa ekudleni. Bazophinde babe nolaka futhi ngokushesha!

SourceText: Your baby will cry as soon as a caregiver’s attention is diverted and are cranky as well as clingy. Prioritise being there for them and give them physical contact when needed.
text: Ingane yakho izokhala lapho umnakekeli wayo engasayinakile futhi icasuka kalula ibuye ikotelane.  Yenza kube yinto ebalulekile ukuba nayo futhi uyibambe noma uyithinte uma kudingeka.

SourceText: Would you like to learn more?
text: Ungathanda ukuthola olunye ulwazi?

SourceText: Your baby or toddler may sometimes want something that they cannot have. If they start whining, first check to see if there is something wrong (are they actually hungry or tired)? If they continue, try to redirect their attention to something else. You should also try to ignore their behaviour while attending to them for comfort and support
text: Kuyenzeka ukuthi umntwana wakho noma ingane yakho ifune into engeke ikwazi ukuyithola. Uma iqala itetema, qala ngokubheka ukuthi ingabe kukhona yini okungahambi kahle(ingabe ilambile yini noma ikhathele)? Uma iqhubeka zama ukuyenzisa enye into ehlukile. Futhi ungazama ukuziba ukuziphatha kwayo kodwa ube uyiduduza futhi uyeseka ngakolunye uhlangothi

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
text: Ngiyaxolisa, angiqondi ukuthi uthini.

SourceText: Check to see why @fields.child_nickname is in a bad mood. Are they tired or hungry? Or maybe they are not feeling well? Or maybe they need some more loving attention. Be a reassuring presence for @fields.child_nickname when they are having a difficult day.
text: Thola ukuthi yingani @fields.child_nickname izizwa ngendlela engeyinhle. Ingabe ikhathele noma ilambile? Noma mhlawumbe ayiphilile kahle? Noma mhlawumbe idinga uthando nokunakwa kakhudlwana. Yiba yithemba ku-@fields.child_nickname ngobukhona kwakho uma usuku lwakhe lungahambi kahle.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Check to see why your baby is in a bad mood. Are they tired or hungry? Or maybe they are not feeling well? Or maybe they need some more loving attention. Be a reassuring presence for your baby when they are having a difficult day.
text: Thola ukuthi yingani ingane yakho izizwa ngendlela engeyinhle. Ingabe ikhathele noma ilambile? Noma mhlawumbe ayiphilile kahle? Noma mhlawumbe idinga uthando nokunakwa kakhudlwana. Yinike ithemba ingane yakho ngobukhona bakho uma usuku lwayo lungahambi kahle.

SourceText: Unfortunately, your baby will go through phases for the next 2 years of sleeping poorly. Try wearing @fields.child_nickname close to you, feeding them and carrying them in a sling. And hang in there, remember it’s a phase. You and @fields.child_nickname will get through it together!
text: Ngebhadi, umntwana wakho uzodlula ezigabeni ezithile eminyakeni emi-2 ezayo yokungalali kahle. Zama ukuba seduze @fields.child_nickname, umuphe ukudla futhi umtete. Bekezela, khumbula ukuthi lesi yisigaba nje esidlulayo. Wena kanye @fields.child_nickname nizodlula kuso nindawonye!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Unfortunately, your baby will go through phases for the next 2 years of sleeping poorly. Try wearing your baby close to you, feeding them and carrying them in a sling. And hang in there, remember it’s a phase. You and your baby will get through it together!
text: Ngebhadi, umntwana wakho uzodlula ezigabeni ezithile eminyakeni emi-2 ezayo yokungalali kahle. Zama ukuba seduze nomntwana wakho, umuphe ukudla futhi umtete. Bekezela, khumbula ukuthi lesi yisigaba nje esidlulayo. Wena kanye nomntwana wakho nizodlula kuso nindawonye!

SourceText: Pay close attention to @fields.child_nickname in case they try something dangerous! Just because they are able to play on their own now, doesn’t mean you can look away for long. Redirect mischievous behaviours into practice waving, imitation games, singing and moving games and pretending to talk on the phone!
text: Qaphelisisa @fields.child_nicknameuma kungenzeka ezama ukwenza okuthile okuyingozi! Akusho ukuthi sekumele angaqashelwa isikhathi eside njengoba  esekwazi ukudlala yedwa.  Myekise ukuganga ngokumfundisa ukuvayisa ngesandla, amagemu okulingisela, ukucula namagemu okuhambayo kanye nokwenza sengathi ukhuluma ngocingo!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Pay close attention to your baby in case they try something dangerous! Just because they are able to play on their own now, doesn’t mean you can look away for long. text: Mqaphelisise umntwana wakho, kungenzeka azame ukwenza okuthile okuyingozi! Akusho ukuthi sekumele angaqashelwa isikhathi eside njengoba  esekwazi ukudlala yedwa.  Myekise ukuganga ngokumfundisa ukuvayisa ngesandla, amagemu okulingisela, ukucula namagemu okuhambayo kanye nokwenza sengathi ukhuluma ngocingo!

SourceText: Try to stay calm and support @fields.child_nickname as they move through the tantrum. Your priority is to ensure that they don’t hurt themselves. Don’t add to @fields.child_nickname’s anger by shouting and showing angry emotions. This won’t help.
text: Zama ukwehlisa umoya futhi uyisize @fields.child_nickname ngesikhathi ithukuthela kakhulu. Okubalulekile kuwe wukuthi ingazilimazi. Ungasenzi isimo sibe sibi kakhulu @fields.child_nickname ngokuyithethisa nangokuyikhombisa intukuthelo yakho. Lokhu ngeke kusize ngalutho.

SourceText: Try to stay calm and support your toddler as they move through the tantrum. Your priority is to ensure that they don’t hurt themselves. Don’t add to your child’s anger by shouting and showing angry emotions. This won’t help.
text: Zama ukwehlisa umoya futhi uyisize ingane yakho ngesikhathi ithukuthela kakhulu. Okubalulekile kuwe wukuthi ingazilimazi. Ungenzi ukuthi ingane yakho ithukuthele kakhulu ngokuyithethisa nangokuyikhombisa intukuthelo yakho. Lokhu ngeke kusize ngalutho.

SourceText: Babies are much more likely to want to do things if you make the activity fun and playful. Patience is also a must. Take a deep breath if you notice yourself getting frustrated by @fields.child_nickname.

SourceText: All children behave badly sometimes. Here are a list of typical behaviours that can be challenging for parents:
text: Zonke izingane ziyaye ziziphathe kabi kwesinye isikhathi. Nalu uhlu lwezindlela zokuziphatha ezingaba yinkinga kumzali:

SourceText: 2. Gets angry a lot

SourceText: 3. Rudeness, disrespectful behaviour
text: 3. Ukudelela, ukungahloniphi

SourceText: 4. Irritable, frequent mood changes

SourceText: 5. Does not follow rules
text: 5. Ukungalandeli imithetho

SourceText: 6. Stubbornness

SourceText: 8. Getting into fights

text: 9. Ukuqala noma ukuhlupha ezinye izingane

SourceText: It is hard to find time to have fun with your children. How many days in the past week did you do something fun together? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Kunzima ukuthola isikhathi sokuzijabulisa nezingane zakho. Zingaki izinsuku esontweni eledlule enenze ngazo okunijabulisayo ndawonye? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: If you don't want to answer, please type 99.
text: Uma ungathandi ukuphendula, sicela uthayiphe u-99.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean. Please reply with a number between 0 and 7.
text: Ngiyaxolisa, angiqondi ukuthi uthini. Sicela uphendule ngenombolo ephakathi kuka-0 no-7.

SourceText: Amazing that you keep doing fun things with your child. You are the best parent they could wish for!
text: Kuyamangalisa ukuthi niyaqhubeka nokwenza izinto ezinijabulisayo wena nengane yakho. Ungumzali oqotho ngempala izingane ezimdingayo!

SourceText: Great that you are setting aside time with your child – it is THE foundation for a happy home!
text: Kuhle ukubona ukuthi uzinikeza isikhathi sokuba nengane yakho - lokhu KUYISISEKELO sokuba nekhaya elinenjabulo!

SourceText: Finding time to do something fun with your child can be hard, I understand! The great thing is that spending time together will make other things go easier – you will see!
text: Kungaba nzima ukuthola isikhathi sokwenza okunijabulisayo wena nengane yakho , ngiyakuqonda lokho! Okuhle kakhulu ukuthi ukuchitha isikhathi ndawonye kungenza ukuthi izinto zibe lula - uzobona wena!

SourceText: Give yourself credit for trying. A 5 minutes of fun activity with your child a day can make a BIG difference.
text: Zincome ngokuzama. Ukuba nesikhathi esiyimizuzu emi-5 unengane yakho ngosuku kungenza umehluko OMKHULU.

SourceText: Life can get so busy sometimes, I know! If you start spending time together doing one small activity, it will get easier over time!
text: Kwesinye isikhathi impilo ingaba matasatasa, ngiyakwazi lokho! Uma niqala nichitha isikhathi nindawonye nenza okuthile okuncane, kungenza isimo sibe lula ekuhambeni kwesikhathi!

SourceText: In our busy lives, it's hard to focus on the positive. How many days in the past week have you praised your child? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Ekuphileni kwethu okumatasa kunzima ukugxila kokuhle. Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule oye wancoma ngazo ingane yakho? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: We all sometimes feel like our children are causing more negativity than positivity. Try to see through negative attitudes and praise any positive behaviour you notice. With time, you will see the change!
text: Kwesinye isikhathi siyaye sibe nomuzwa wokuthi izingane zethu ziyasidumaza ukudlula ukusijabulisa. Zama ukubona ngale kokubi bese uncoma lokho okuhle okubonayo. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uzolubona ushintsho!

SourceText: This is a very stressful time for families. How many days in the past week did you feel very stressed as a parent/caregiver? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Lesi yisikhathi esicindezela kakhulu emindenini. Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule ozizwe ngazo ucindezeleke kakhulu njengomzali/njengomnakekeli? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: Would you like a brief activity to help you with stress?
text: Ungathanda ukwenza okuncane nje okungakusiza ukuthi wehlise izinga lokucindezeleka?

SourceText: Would like a brief relaxing activity now?
text: Ungathanda yini ukwenza okuncane nje okuzophumuza ingqondo yakho?

SourceText: Sometimes our children make us really upset. How many days in the past week did you shout, scream, or yell at your children? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Ngezinye izikhathi izingane zethu zisithukuthelisa kakhulu. Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule lapho khona uye wamemeza, waklabalasa noma wathethisa izingane zakho? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: It can be difficult to control our anger, especially when they make us really angry. Take a deep breath, and be proud of yourself when you manage to do it!
text: Kungaba nzima ukulawula intukuthelo yethu, ikakhulukazi uma zisenza sithukuthele kakhulu. Donsa umoya bese uwudedela kancane, ziqhenye ngawe uma ukwazile ukukwenza!

SourceText: Sorry that you are having a difficult time with your child. It happens to all of us. Remember, we can choose to behave differently next time.
text:
Kuyadabukisa ukuthi wena nengane yakho nithwele kanzima. Lokhu kuyenzeka kithi sonke. 
 Khumbula ukuthi singakhetha okwehlukile esikhathini esizayo.

SourceText: Being a parent is not easy. Try to be patient with yourself and your family, and take some space if you need it. By talking about our challenges calmly, we can solve them together!
text: Ukuba umzali akulula. Zama ukuzibekezelela wena nomndeni wakho, uzinikeze isikhathi uwedwa uma kudingeka. Uma ukhuluma ngezinkinga zakho ngomoya ophansi, singakwazi ukuzixazulula ndawonye!

SourceText: Great work! When we respond calmly, our teens are more likely to do the same.
text: Muhle lo msebenzi! Uma uphendula ngomoya ophansi , intsha yethu nayo kungenzeka yenze okufanayo.

SourceText: Our children can really drive us crazy sometimes. By responding calmly, they will learn to do the same when something upsets them at home or outside. Your patience will pay off, you will see!
text: Izingane zethu zingasihlanyisa kwesinye isikhathi. Uma siphendula ngomoya ophansi, nazo zizofunda ukwenza okufanayo uma kukhona okuzicasulayo ekhaya noma ngaphandle. Ukubekezela kwakho kuzokusiza, uzobona!

SourceText: It is so stressful when children misbehave. How many days in the past week did you physically discipline your children by hitting, spanking, or slapping with your hand or an object like a stick or a belt? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Kucindezela kakhulu lapho izingane zingalaleli. Zibe ngaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule, ojezise ngazo izingane zakho ngokuzishaya, ngokuzithansula noma ngokuzishaya ngempama noma ngokuzishaya ngento enjengenduku noma ibhande? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: We all struggle to stay calm sometimes. Take a deep breath and remember that mistakes are human. Talking to your child will help more in the end – you are an awesome parent!
text: Kwezinye izikhathi akulula kithi sonke ukwehlisa umoya. Donsa umoya bese uwudedela kancane bese ukhumbula ukuthi akekho umuntu ongenamaphutha. Ukukhulumisana nengane yakho kuzokusiza ekugcineni - ungumzali oqotho!

SourceText: It can be so difficult to keep calm when things get out of hand. Try again next time – each day is a new opportunity!
text: Akukho lula ukwehlisa umoya uma izinto zingasalawuleki. Zama futhi esikhathi esizayo - lolo nalolo suku luletha ithuba elisha!

SourceText: It sounds like you are having a difficult time with your child. This can be really hard so be patient with yourself. Try to take a pause (even one deep breath!) next time and respond differently. You can do it!
text: Kuzwakala sengathi wena nengane yakho nithwele kanzima. Akulula neze lokhungakho-ke kudingeka ukuthi uzibekezelele. Zama ukuma kancane (udonse nomoya!) ngokuzayo uphendule ngokwehlukile. Ungakwazi ukukwenza lokhu.

SourceText: Money is one of the biggest stresses for families now. How many days in the past week have you felt very worried or anxious about money? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)
text: Imali ingenye yezinto ezicindezela imindeni kakhulu manje. Zingaki izinsuku esontweni elidlule obukhathazeke kakhulu ngazo noma unokwesaba mayelana nemali? (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7)

SourceText: How many days in the past month (30 days) did you run out of money to pay for food? (0, 1, 2, 3, ... 30)?
text: Zingaki izinsuku enyangeni edlule (izinsuku ezingu-30) oye waphelelwa kuzo yimali yokuthenga ukudla? (0, 1, 2, 3, ... 30)?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean. Please reply with a number between 0 and 30.
text: Ngiyaxolisa, angiqondi ukuthi uthini. Sicela uphendule ngenombolo ephakathi kuka-0 no-30.

SourceText: It can sometimes be difficult to have a positive relationship with our children. How confident do you feel about your ability as a parent/caregiver to have a positive relationship with your children? (0=not confident to 7=extremely confident)
text: Kwesinye isikhathi akulula ukuba nobudlelwane obuhle nezingane zethu. Unokwezethemba kangakanani ngekhono lakho njengomzali/njengomnakekeli ekubeni nobudlelwane obuhle nezingane zakho? (0=anginakho ukuzethemba 7=ngiyazethemba kakhulu impela)

SourceText: Having a positive relationship with our children can be difficult, especially during stressful times. You might want to try spending a little more One-on-One Time with your child. It will show them that they are valued and loved.
text: Akulula ukuba nobudlelwane obuhle nezingane zakho, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi esinengcindezi. Ubungafisa ukuzama ukuthi nibe nesikhathi esithe xaxa Ninobabili Ndawonye nengane yakho  Kuzozikhombisa ukuthi zibalulekile futhi ziyathandwa.

SourceText: It is so wonderful to hear that you are able to maintain a positive relationship with your children. They really benefit from having you as a source of love and support in their lives.
text: Kuhle kakhulu ukuzwa ukuthi uyakwazi ukugcina ubudlelwane obuhle nezingane zakho. Siyasizakala ukuba nawe njengomthombo wothando kanye nosizo ezimpilweni zazo.

SourceText: Bonus question: We all want to keep our children safe. In the past month, have you talked with your child about keeping safe from sexual violence online or offline? This could be when they are going out with friends, or talking about the websites they use.
text: Umbuzo oqukethe amaphuzu athe xaxa: Sonke sifuna ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile. ZEnyangeni edlule, uke wakhuluma nengane yakho mayelana nokuzigcina iphephile ekuhlukunyezweni ngokocansi ku-inthanethi noma ekuphileni okungokoqobo? Lokhu kungaba lapho zizikhipha nabangane noma lapho nikhuluma ngamawebusayithi eziwasebenzisayo.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean. Please reply with either yes or no.
text: Ngiyaxolisa, angiqondi ukuthi uthini. Sicela uphendule ngokuthi yebo noma cha.

SourceText: How many days have you had a talk like this? ? (0, 1, 2, 3, ... 30)?
text: Nixoxisane izinsuku ezingaki ngalokhu? (0, 1, 2, 3, ... 30)?

SourceText: Being a parent is not easy. It can be difficult to know how to keep our children safe. We often feel powerless as parents in this, but we are here to support you!
text: Ukuba umzali akulula. Akulula ukwazi indlela yokugcina izingane zethu ziphephile. Ngokuvamile sizizwa singenamandla njengabazali kulokhu, kodwa silapha ukuze sikusekele!

SourceText: Being a parent is not easy. Well done for focusing on keeping your child safe.
text: Ukuba umzali akulula. Wenze kahle ngokugxila ekugcineni ingane yakho iphephile.

SourceText: Well done for spending time with your child, it makes all the difference @fields.user_name!
text: Wenza kahle ngokuchitha isikhathi sakho nengane yakho, kwenza umehluko @fields.user_name!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Well done for spending time with your child, it makes all the difference!
text: Wenza kahle ngokuchitha isikhathi sakho nengane yakho, kwenza umehluko !

SourceText: So good that you and your child are having fun times together. Your hard work is paying off, you should be proud of yourself @fields.user_name!
text: Kuhle ukuthi wena nengane yakho ninesikhathi esimnandi ndawonye. Ukusebenza kwakho kanzima kuyasebenza, kumele uziqhenye ngalokho @fields.user_name!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: So good that you and your child are having fun times together. Your hard work is paying off, you should be proud of yourself!

SourceText: It can be hard to find time during your day, with work, chores, and everything else. Can you think of even 30 minutes this week to do this activity? It will make a big difference in keeping you safe online. You can do it!

SourceText: That is okay! Here is a list of some of the risks and dangers that you may encounter online:
text: Kulungile! Nalu uhlu lwezinto eziyingozi kanye nobungozi ongahlangana nako ku-inthanethi:

SourceText: • Adults targeting people for sexual purposes on social media, gaming, and messaging platforms.
text: Abantu abadala abafunana nabantu ngezinjongo zocansi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwezemidlalo, kanye nasezinkundleni zemiyalezo.

SourceText: • Harmful content – like violence, hating women, hating foreigners, encouraging suicide and self-harm, misinformation, pornography
text: Okuqukethwe olimazayo - njengodlame, ukuzonda abantu besifazane, ukuzonda abakufika, ukukhuthaza ukuzibulala kanye nokuzilimaza, ulwazi olungelona, izithombe namavidiyo ezocansi

SourceText: • Sharing personal information and sexual photos or videos.
text: Ukwabelana kwentsha ngemininingwane yabo siqu kanye nezithombe noma amavidiyo kocansi.

SourceText: • Cyberbullying from other people and strangers.
text: Ukuhlukumezana kwi-inthanethi okuvela kwabanye abantu nabantu ongabazi.

SourceText: Sorry to hear that you are finding this challenging. Here is a review on quick technical fixes:

SourceText: • Turn on SafeSearch on your browser to filter adult content.
text: Vula i-SafeSearch kubhrawuza yakho ukuze ucwenge okuqukethwe okumaqondana nabantu abadala.

SourceText: https://www.internetmatters.org/blog/parental-controls/entertainment-search-engines/

text: Setha izilawuli zabazali.

text: https://www.internetmatters.org/parental-controls/

SourceText: • Set up strict privacy settings on online apps and games.
text: Setha amasethingi aqondene nokuyimfihlo kuma-app kanye namagemu okuku-inthanethi.

SourceText: It is completely normal to experience this challenge. People’s wants and needs are different sometimes. Talking about them together can help you and your family to understand each other, respect your differences, and see where you can compromise.

SourceText: This programme is for parents and caregivers like you (aged 18 or older).
text: Lolu hlelo ngolwabazali nabanakekeli abafana nawe (abaneminyaka eyi-18 ubudala nangaphezulu).

SourceText: Over the next few weeks, you will receive messages to help you manage stress and maintain positive relationships at home.
text: Emasontweni ambalwa azayo, uzothola imiyalezo ezokusiza ukuthi ukwazi ukulawula ukucindezeleka nokugcina ubudlelwane obuhle ekhaya.

SourceText: Your participation and any information you provide will be used anonymously by researchers to learn about how to better support families like yours.
text: Ukubamba kwakho iqhaza kanye nolwazi oluhlinzekayo luzosetshenziswa ngaphandle kkokwaziwa ukuthi ngolwakho ngabacwaningi ngenhloso yokuthola mayelana bangayeseka kangcono kanjani imindeni efana neyakho.

SourceText: Type "Yes" if you agree with this. Type "Exit" if you do not want to participate. Click here for more information:
text: Thayipha “Yebo” uma uvumelana nalokhu. Thayipha “Phuma” uma ungathandi ukubamba iqhaza. Cofoza lapha ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi:

SourceText: https://covid19parenting.com/assets/consents/eng.pdf
text: https://covid19parenting.com/assets/consents/eng.pdf

SourceText: That is wonderful, thank you so much!
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokhu, siyabonga kakhulu!

SourceText: Can you please confirm that you are 18 years old or older?
text: Sicela uqinisekise ukuthi uneminyaka eyi-18 ubudala noma ngaphezulu?

SourceText: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "STOP MESSAGES." If you made a mistake, please type "back" and choose another option.
text: Ingabe uqinisekisile ukuthi awuthandi ukuthola le miyalezo? Uma ungasathandi ukuthola le miyalezo, sicela uthayiphe “MISA IMIYALEZO.” Uma wenze iphutha , sicela uthayiphe “emuva” bese ukhetha okunye.

SourceText: Sorry, ParentText is only for people over the age of 18. Do you confirm that you are under the age of 18?
text: Siyaxolisa, i-ParetText ngeyabantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-18 kuphela. Ingabe uyaqinisekisa ukuthi ungaphansi kweminyaka eyi-18 ubudala?

SourceText: If you want to experience ParentText, you can always share it with your parents or caregivers.
text: Uma uthanda ukusebenzisa i-ParentText, ungabatshela nabazali bakhp noma abanakekeli bakho.

SourceText: Thank you so much for confirming this. You are now ready to begin your ParentText journey!
text: Siyabonga ngokuqinisekisa lokhu! Usukulungele ukuqala uhambo lwakho lwe-ParentText!

SourceText: Did you know that over 194 million parents around the world have used our resources developed by Parenting for Lifelong Health, WHO, and UNICEF?

SourceText: We know, it is hard to remember to give one instruction at a time. When we do it, our child is more likely to listen – so we can praise them even more!

SourceText: I know, it is hard to remember to give one instruction at a time. When we do it, our child is more likely to listen – so we can praise them even more!
text: Ngiyazi ukuthi akulula ukukhumbula ukunikezela ngomyalelo owodwa ngasikhathi sinye. Uma senza kanjalo, makhulu amathuba okuthi ingane yethu ilalele - ukuze siphinde siyincome futhi njalo njalo!

SourceText: We know, our children need time to learn to follow instructions. Be patient, try again, and remember to praise them every time they follow an instruction!

SourceText: We know, it takes some time to get used to giving positive instructions – it’s really worth trying again! Think about behaviour you would love to see @fields.child_nickname do more, and think of positive ways to give that instruction!

SourceText: Name that tune
text: Qamba le ngoma

SourceText: First person gets to choose or sing a song.
text: Umuntu wokuqala nguye okhethayo noma ocula ingoma.

SourceText: Everyone else must guess the name of the tune (to make it harder they can guess the singer).
text: Wonke umuntu kumele aqagele igama lengoma (ukuze kube nzima, bangaqagela umculi).

SourceText: The first one to guess it right becomes the next leader who will choose or sing the next song.
text: Owokuqala ozoqagela kahle kuba nguyena oba ngumholi olandelayo ozokhetha noma acule iculo elilandelayo.

SourceText: Hi @fields.user_name! How are you feeling?
text: Sawubona @fields.user_name! Uzizwa kanjani namuhla?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi! How are you feeling?
text: Sawubona! Uzizwa kanjani namuhla?

SourceText: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. It is completely normal to be going through a difficult time now. Remember that you are not alone.
text: Ngiyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi usuku lwakho aluhambi kahle. Kuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi njengamanje udlula ezikhathini esinzima. Khumbula ukuthi awuwedwa.

SourceText: Here's a video to help you get through the day!
text: Nansi ividiyo ezokusiza ukuthi ukwazi ukuphothula usuku lwakho!

SourceText: Here's an audio message to help you get through the day!
text: Nawu umyalezo oqoshiwe ozokusiza ukwazi ukuphothula usuku lwakho!

SourceText: Here is a short activity that can help when you are feeling like needing some more support to get through the day.
text: Nakhu okwenziwayo okufushane okungakusiza uma uzizwa sengathi udinga ukwesekwa ekuphothuleni usuku lwakho.

SourceText: Recognise what is happening for you in this moment. What are you thinking? Are your thoughts positive or negative. How do you feel? Do you feel pleasant or unpleasant? How does your body feel? Do you feel tense or relaxed?
text: Qaphela lokho okwenzekayo kuwe njengamanje. Yini oyicabangayo? Ingabe imicabango yakho mihle noma mibi. Uzizwa kanjani? Ingabe uzizwa ujabule noma ungajabule? Umzimba wakho uzizwa kanjani? Ingabe uzizwa ubophekile noma ukhululekile?

SourceText: Sit comfortably and close your eyes. Connect to your heart in a kind and gentle way. You may want to place one hand on your heart or chest. Say the following words silently to yourself:
text: Hlala ngokunethezeka bese uvala amehlo akho. Xhumana nenhliziyo yakho ngendlela enomusa nemnene. Ungase ufune ukubeka isandla esisodwa enhliziyweni yakho noma esifubeni. Buthule yisho la mazwi alandelayo kuwe:

SourceText: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Notice if you feel any different.
text: Zinike isikhathi sokucabanga ngokwenzeke kuwe. Qaphela ukuthi ukhona yini umehluko owuzwayo.

SourceText: May I be peaceful.
text: Kwangathi ngingaba nokuthula.

SourceText: May I be safe.
text: Kwangathi ngingaphepha.

SourceText: May I be healthy.
text: Kwangathi ngingaba nempilo enhle.

SourceText: May I be happy.
text: Kwangathi ngingajabula.

SourceText: May there be love in my family.
text: Kwangathi kungaba nothando emndenini wami.

SourceText: May I feel loved.
text: Kwangathi ngingazizwa ngithandwa.

SourceText: If you ever need additional support to help you cope with any stress or other emotional difficulties, type "Help". Chat to you later @fields.user_name!
text: Uma kwenzeka udinga okunye ukwesekwa ngenhloso yokuthola usizo mayelana nanoma yikuphi ukucindezeleka noma izinkinga eziphathelene ngendlela ozizwa ngayo, thayipha “Usizo”.  Siyobuye sikhulume @fields.user_name!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: If you ever need additional support to help you cope with any stress or other emotional difficulties, type "Help". Chat to you later!
text: Uma kwenzeka udinga okunye ukwesekwa ngenhloso yokuthola usizo mayelana nanoma yikuphi ukucindezeleka noma izinkinga eziphathelene ngendlela ozizwa ngayo, thayipha “Usizo”.  Ngizokhuluma nawe emva kwesikhashana!

SourceText: What state or territory are you from?
text: Uphuma kuliphi izwe?

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean. Please reply with a number between 1 and @fields.n_states.
text: Ngiyaxolisa, angiqondi ukuthi uthini. Sicela uphendule ngenombolo ephakathi kuka-1 no-@fields.n_states.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi @fields.user_name! Have you tried involving your partner when making decisions recently?
text: Sawubona @fields.user_name! Ingabe uzamile yini ukubandakanya uphathina wakho ngesikhathi uthatha izinqumo osandakuzithatha?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi! Have you tried involving your partner when making decisions recently?
text: Sawubona! Ingabe uzamile yini ukubandakanya uphathina wakho ngesikhathi uthatha izinqumo osandakuzithatha?

SourceText: How was your experience?
text: Kwenzekeni kuwe?

SourceText: That is fantastic!
text: Kuhle kakhulu lokhu!

SourceText: Would you like to review the content on this?
text: Ungathanda yini ukubuyekeza okuqukethwe mayelana nalokhu?

SourceText: It can be difficult to find the time to ask our partners for their opinions when we are making decisions. Can you think of a time during the day when both you and your partner might be less busy, such as early in the morning or later in the evening?
text: Akulula ukuthola isikhathi sokubuza ophathina bethu mayelana nemibono yabo ngesikhathi sithatha izinqumo. Ungacabanga ngesikhathi sosuku lapho wena nophathina wakho ningekho matasa kakhulu, njengasekuseni noma ngemuva kwesidlo sakusihlwa?

SourceText: Sorry to hear that your partner reacted negatively. Be proud of yourself for trying and be gentle with yourself. Remember you can always get extra support by typing "Help".
text: Ngiyaxolisa ukuzwa ukuthi uphathina wakho uphendule ngendlela engeyinhle. Ziqhenye ngokuzama futhi ungazehluleli. Khumbula ukuthi uyakwazi ukuthola olunye usizo ngokuthayipha “Usizo”.

SourceText: It can sometimes be hard to know how to involve your partner when making a decision. Sometimes all you need to do is to ask them what they think. This shows them you care and want them to be involved!
text: Kungaba nzima kwesinye isikhathi ukwazi ukuthi ungambandakanya kanjani uphathina wakho ngesikhathi uthatha isinqumo. Kwesinye isikhathi kudingeka nje ukuthi umbuze ukuthi yena ucabangani ngalokho. Lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi uyamkhathalela futhi uyafuna ukuthi abandakanyeke!

SourceText: It can be hard to remember to involve our partners in decision making. If you forget, it’s important to try again! Asking them for their opinion shows them that you care and want them to be involved.
text: Kungaba nzima ukukhumbula ukubandakanya ophathina bethu uma sithatha izinqumo. Uma ukhohlwa, kubalulekile ukuthi uphinde uzame futhi! Uma ucela ukuthi akunikeze umbono wakhe kukhombisa ukuthi uyamkhathalela futhi uyafuna ukumbandakanya.

SourceText: It can take time to get used to making decisions together. Give yourself time to adjust. Remember that by communicating with your partner and involving them in decision-making, they will start to feel more comfortable doing so too.
text: Kungathatha isikhathi esidenyana  ukujwayela ukuthatha izinqumo ndawonye. Zinikeze isikhathi sokuzejwayeza. Khumbula ukuthi uma ukhuluma nophathina wakho futhi umbandakanya ekuthatheni izinqumo, naye uzoqala ukukhululeka kakhulu ekwenzeni lokho.

SourceText: We are sorry to hear this. What did you find difficult when trying to involve your partner in making a decision?
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokhu. Yiyiphi inkinga ohlangabezane nayo ngesikhathi uzama ukubandakanya uphathina wakho ekuthatheni isinqumo.

SourceText: I am sorry to hear this. What did you find difficult when trying to involve your partner in making a decision?
text: Ngiyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokho. Yiyiphi inkinga ohlangabezane nayo ngesikhathi uzama ukubandakanya uphathina wakho ekuthatheni isinqumo.

SourceText: Notice where you feel it in your body. Notice what thoughts are connected to that feeling. Take a deep breath.
text: Qaphela ukuthi ukuzwa kuphi emzimbeni wakho. Qaphela ukuthi yimiphi imicabango ehlobene nalowo muzwa. Donsa umoya kakhulu.

SourceText: Thank yourself for taking the time to check in with your feelings and thoughts! Remember, you can always type "Help" at anytime if you need an activity to help you relax or reduce stress. Chat later!

SourceText: Here's an audio message to guide you through a fun physical activity!
text: Nanku umyalezo oqoshiwe ozokuhlahlela indlela mayelana nalokho okwenziwayo ngokomzimba nokuthokozisayo!

SourceText: Stand up and stretch your arms up like you are reaching to the sky. Pretend to push away any clouds and let the sun shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.
text: Yima bese ulula izingalo zakho zibheke phezulu esibhakabhakeni. Yenza sengathi usunduza amafu ngenhloso yokwenza ukuthi ilanga likukhanyise. Zelule kuzo zombili izinhlangothi. Zilulele phambili nasemuva.

SourceText: Here's a fun video of a physical activity that can help you release stress and keep healthy!
text: Nansi ividiyo yokunyakazisa umzimba engakusiza ukuthi wehlise izinga lokucindezeleka nokugcina unempilo!

SourceText: Let your hand hang by your side. As you breathe in, squeeze your shoulders tightly up to your ears, scrunch your eyes and face, and hold your breath. Release your breath and then relax your shoulders and body.
text: Lengisa isandla sakho eceleni. Ngesikhathi uphefumula, cindezela amahlombe akhuphuke afike ezindlebeni zakho, ucimeza ngokuqinisa amehlo akho nobuso bakho bese ubamba umoya wakho. Dedela umoya bese wehlisa amahlombe nomzimba.

SourceText: Relax your arms and let your arms swing sideways, and turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.
text: Khulula izingalo zakho futhi uzivumele zilenge emaceleni futhi uphenduka ngengxenye engenhla yomzimba wakho. Izingalo zakho kufanele zishaye kancane umgogodla wakho njengoba utshikiza, ujikajika.

SourceText: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from ankles, remember to turn to both sides. Do each foot with four circles in each direction.
text: Beka unyawo olulodwa phambi kolunye bese ujikajikisa amaqakala, ukhumbule ukuphendukela ezinhlangothini zombili. Yenza lokho onyaweni ngalunye ngezindilinga ezine ohlangothini ngalunye.

SourceText: Now shake your whole body as fast as you can. Shake it up high! Shake it down low! Shake it all around!
text: Manje nyakazisa wonke umzimba ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka. Gxumagxuma uye phezulu kakhulu! Guqa uye phansi kakhulu! Ushukumise yonke indawo!

SourceText: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out.
text: Vala amehlo akho bese uphakamise izingalo zakho kancane kancane ziye ngaphezu kwekhanda lakho njengoba udonsa umoya. Yehlisela izingalo zakho ohlangothini kancane kancane njengoba ukhipha umoya.

SourceText: Would you like some  other relaxation activities?
text: Ungathanda ukuthola okunye okwenziwayo kokuphumuza umzimba?

SourceText: Take a moment to reflect on your experience.
text: Zinike isikhathi sokucabanga ngokwenzeke kuwe.

SourceText: Well done for trying! How was your experience?
text: Wenze kahle ngokuzama! Kwenzekeni kuwe?

SourceText: Sometimes it can be hard to find time during the day. Can you think of a time when you’re less busy? For example, maybe it is easier to help out with housework later in the evening when some of the children have gone to sleep. Try to see what works for you!
text: Kwesinye isikhathi akukho lula ukuthola isikhathi osukwini. Sikhona isikhathi ongacabanga ngaso lapho ungekho matasatasa khona! Isibonelo, mhlawumbe kungaba lula ukusiza ngomsebenzi wasendlini ebusuku ngesikhathi ezinye izingane sezihambile zayolala. Zama ukuthola lokho okungakusebenzela!

SourceText: Ask them! By telling your partner you want to help out but don’t know how, you are showing them you care and are interested in being involved. This can also help family members understand each other better.
text: Mbuze! Uma utshela uphathina wakho ukuthi ufisa ukusiza kodwa awazi ukuthi ungasiza ngokwenzani, uzobe umkhombisa ukuthi uyamkhathalela futhi uyathanda ukuzibandakanya. Lokhu kungenza namalungu omndeni ukuthi azane kangcono.

SourceText: It can be difficult to remember to ask others what they need help with. Once you start offering to help however, others may realise you want to be involved and may ask for help when they need it!
text: Kungaba nzima ukukhumbula ukucela abanye abantu ukuthi kudingeka ukuthi basize ngani. Uma uqala uzinikela ekutheni ufuna ukusiza, abanye bangakwazi ukubona ukuthi ufuna ukuzibandakanya bese becela ukuthi ubasize uma kudingeka!

SourceText: It can be hard to ask for help. Sometimes we expect our partners to know we need help even if we don’t ask them. Once you start telling however, they will likely start offering to help more often in the future.
text: Akulula ukucela ukusizwa. Kwesinye isikhathi silindela ukuthi ophathina bethu bazi ukuthi sidinga ukusizwa kodwa sibe singabacelanga. Uma uqala umcela, naye uzoqala azisukele avame ukukusiza ngokuzayo.

SourceText: Be kind to yourself - trying something new is often hard at first! Give yourself time to adjust. Also remind yourself that helping your partner with these tasks benefits the whole family!
text: Ungazehluleli - ukuzama ukwenza into entsha kuvame ukungabi lula ekuqaleni! Zinikeze isikhathi sokuzejwayeza. Zikhumbuze futhi ukuthi ukusiza uphathina wakho ekwenzeni le misebenzi kusiza wonke umndeni!

text: Sawubona! Lesi yisikhathi esicindezelayo, ikakhulukazi mayelana nomama. Uma sicindezelekile noma sithukuthele, asikwazi ukwenza izinqumo eziphusile.  Ukuzinikeza isikhathi sokuzinakekela kuzosisiza ukuthi sikwazi ukunakekela izingane zethu.

SourceText: Hello! This is a stressful time, especially for parents. When we are stressed or angry, we do not make the best decisions. Taking the time to care for ourselves will help us care for our children.
text: Sawubona! Lesi yisikhathi esicindezelayo, ikakhulukazi mayelana nabazali. Uma sicindezelekile noma sithukuthele, asikwazi ukwenza izinqumo eziphusile.  Ukuzinikeza isikhathi sokuzinakekela kuzosisiza ukuthi sikwazi ukunakekela izingane zethu.

SourceText: It looks like you are facing an emergency. Can you please tell us what kind of assistance you require?
text: Kubukeka sengathi ubhekene nesimo esiphuthumayo. Ungakwazi ukusitshela ukuthi hlobo luni losizo oludingayo?

SourceText: Type "SOS" at any time if you would like the details of any other emergency service or hotline. Remember everything you say will be completely private!
text: Thayipha “SOS” noma nini uma ufuna imininingwane yezimo eziphuthumayo noma ezinye izinombolo zosizo. Khumbula konke okushoyo kuzogcinwa kuyimfihlo!

SourceText: Let's take a pause together! Take a deep breath and ask yourself, "What am I thinking?"
text: Ake sithathe ikhefu elisheshayo ndawonye. Donsa umoya kakhulu bese uwudedela kancane bese uzibuza ukuthi,  “Ngicabangani?”

SourceText: Notice if your thoughts are positive or negative. Notice if your emotions are pleasant or unpleasant. Whatever you are feeling, it is okay. Notice how your body feels. Notice anything that hurts or is tense.
text: Qaphela ukuthi imicabango yakho mihle noma mibi yini. Qaphela ukuthi imizwelo yakho eyenjabulo noma cha. Noma ngabe uzizwa kanjani, kulungile. Qaphela indlela umzimba wakho ozizwa ngayo. Qaphela noma yini ebuhlungu noma ebophekile.

SourceText: Focus on your breath as it goes in and out. Do this for about 10 breaths.
text: Yizwa ukuphefumula kwakho njengoba udonsa umoya uphinde uwudedela. Kwenze lokhu izikhathi eziyishumi odonsa ngazo umoya.

SourceText: Now, expand your awareness to your whole body. Listen to the sounds in the room.
text: Manje, yandisa ulwazi lwakho ngomzimba wakho wonke.    Lalela imisindo esegumbini.

SourceText: Take a moment to reflect on whether you feel any different.
text: Zinike isikhathi sokuhlola ukuthi ukhona yini umehluko owuzwayo.

SourceText: Here's a video about how to keep calm and manage stress in our busy lives.
text: Nayi ividiyo emayelana nendlela yokukwazi ukwehlisa umoya nokulawula ukucindezeleka kulezi zikhathi ezimatasatasa esiphila kuzo.

SourceText: Taking a Pause is a simple relaxation activity that you can do whenever you are feeling stressed or worried. It can also be helpful when you find your child is irritating you or has done something wrong.
text: Ukuthatha Ikhefu kuyindlela yokuphumula elula ongayenza noma ukuphi uma uzizwa ucindezelekile noma ukhathazekile. Futhi lingakusiza uma ingane yakho ikucasula noma kukhona ekwenzile okungafanele.

SourceText: Here is a comic to remind you of taking a pause!
text: Nayi ikhomikhi ekukhumbuza ukuthi uthathe ikhefu!

SourceText: “How am I going to get through this?”
text: “Ngizophuma kanjani kulokhu?”

SourceText: “Whatever it is, I am okay.”
text: “Noma kungaba yini, kulungile.”

SourceText: “Breathe in. Breathe out."
text: “Donsa umoya. Dedela umoya”

SourceText: “I can do this. We will get through it together.”
text: “Ngingakwazi ukukwenza lokhu. Sizodlula kule simo sindawonye.”

SourceText: Chat later!
text: Sizokhuluma emva kwesikhashana!

SourceText: Well done for Taking a Pause @fields.user_name. You have added another skill to your Parenting Toolkit! Over the next few days, try taking a pause whenever you are feeling stressed. It gives you a chance to be calmer. Even a few deep breaths or connecting with the ground beneath you can make a difference. You can also Take a Pause with your Child!
text: Wenza kahle Ngokuthatha Ikhefu @fields.user_name. Wengeze elinye ikhono ku-Parenting Toolkit yakho! Ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezizayo, zama ukuthatha ikhefu uma uzizwa ucindezelekile. Kukunika ithuba lokuzola. Ngisho nokudonsa umoya izikhathi ezimbalwa noma ukuxhumana nomhlaba omi kuwo kungenza umehluko. Ungathatha Ikhefu Nengane yakho!

SourceText: Hi @fields.user_name! Were you able to spend 5 minutes or more of One-on-One Time with your children today?
text: Sawubona @fields.user_name! Ingabe ukwazile yini ukuchitha imizuzu emi-5 noma ngaphezulu yokuba nengane yakho nobabili nje kuphela namhlanje
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi! Were you able to spend 5 minutes or more of One-on-One Time with your children today?
text: Sawubona! Ingabe ukwazile yini ukuchitha imizuzu emi-5 noma ngaphezulu yokuba nengane yakho nobabili nje kuphela namhlanje

SourceText: Wonderful! Spending One-on-One Time with your children may make them more willing to help out more often. You are doing great!
text: Kuhle kakhulu! Ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zakho ninodwa kungenza ukuthi zizimisele ukusiza kakhudlwana kunakuqala. Wenza kahle kakhulu!

SourceText: We understand that spending One-on-One Time can sometimes be difficult. Here are some of the main reasons parents struggle. Which one is the closest to you?
text: Siyaqonda ukuthi ukuchitha nengane yakho ninodwa kungase kube nzima ngezinye izikhathi. Nazi ezinye zezizathu ezisemqoka ezenza abazali bathwale kanzima. Yisiphi esiseduze kakhulu nawe?

SourceText: It can be hard to find time during your day, with work, chores, and everything else. Can you think of a time each day that you can make 5 minutes or a bit more? You can even make household chores into a game to do together. Even 5 minutes can make a big difference!
text: Akulula ukuthola isikhathi phakathi nosuku, ngenxa yomsebenzi, imisebenzi yasekhaya kanye nakho konke okunye. Ungacabanga ngesikhathi ongasithatha ngalolo nalolo suku esiyimizuzu emu-5 noma ngaphezudlwana. Ningenza nomsebenzi wasendlini ngendlela yokudlala ndawonye. Ngisho imizuzu emi-5 ingenza umehluko omkhulu!

SourceText: Children often want to spend time watching T.V. or playing with a gadget. Sometimes you might want to give them some other fun options to do instead (Type: "Help" if you want a suggestion).
text: Ngokuvamile izingane zifuna ukuchitha isikhathi zibukela i-TV noma zidlala ngamagajethi Kwesinye isikhathi ungathanda ukuthi zizikhethele okunye ezingakuthokozela esikhundleni salokhu (Thayipha:  “Usizo” uma ufuna isiphakamiso).

SourceText: It can make you feel bad if your children do not want to spend One-on-One Time with you. Think to yourself: When are they more open to you? Maybe in the morning or right before bedtime.
text: Kungakwenza uzizwe kabi uma izingane zakho zingafuni ukuchitha isikhathi nawe ninodwa. Zicabangele: Zivuleleka nini kuwe? Kungenzeka yini ukuthi kube yisekuseni noma ngaphambi kokuyolala.

SourceText: Competitive games can be challenging for children (and adults!) if they have difficulty losing. You may want to suggest other activities that you can play together instead of against each other (Type "Help" if you want a suggestion").
text: Imidlalo yokuncintisana ingaba yinselele ezinganeni (kanye nakubantu abadala!) uma zinenkinga ngokungaphumeleli. Ungafisa ukuphakamisa ezinye izinto ezingenziwa eningadlala ndawonye esikhundleni sokuqhudelana (Thayipha “uSizo” uma udinga isiphakamiso”)

SourceText: Sometimes our children will suggest activities that are violent or unsafe. Explain why they can't, and try suggesting alternative activities that would be more appropriate. Type "Help" if you want a suggestion.
text: Kwesinye isikhathi izingane zethu ziphakamisa lokho okwenziwayo okunodlame noma okungaphephile. Chaza ukuthi yingani kungeke kusetshenziswe lokho, bese uzama ukuphakamisa okunye okunziwayo okufanele esikhundleni salokho.  Thayipha “Usizo” uma udinga isiphakamiso.

SourceText: It can be difficult to spend One-on-One Time with each one child when you have more than one child. If possible, you can ask another adult or older sibling to look after the other children while you spend One-on-One Time with one child.
text: Kungaba nzima ukuchitha isikhathi sokuthi nibe nobabili nengane uma unezingane ezingaphezulu kweyodwa. Uma kungenzeka, ungacela omunye umuntu omdala noma umfowenu noma udadewenu ukuba anakekele ezinye izingane ngesikhathi usachitha isikhathi sokuthi nibe nodwa  nobabili nengane eyodwa.

SourceText: We are sorry to hear that you have been having some difficulties spending One-on-One Time with your children. Please type "Help" for other advice that might be of use to you. Thank you for trying your best!
text: Siyaxolisa ukuthi ukuthi ubuthwele kanzima ekutheni ukwazi ukubchitha isikhathi sokuba nengane ngayinye ezinganeni zakho. Sicela uthayiphe “Usizo” ukuze uthole iseluleko esingakusiza. Siyabonga ngokuzama ngakho konke!

SourceText: You can also think of times when it would be easier to spend One-on-One Time each child, like later in the evening with an older child after the others have gone to sleep.
text: Ungacabanga ngezikhathi lapho kungaba lula khona ukuthi uchithe isikhathi nengane nibe nobabili, njengokuthi ube nesikhathi nengane esikhulakhulile ebusuku emva kokuthi ezinye sezilele.

SourceText: You can also spend One-on-One Time with all of your children at once!
text: Ungachitha isikhathi sokuthi ube nazo zonke izingane ngesikhathi esisodwa!

SourceText: Type "Help" for activities that you can do as a whole family
text: Thayipha “Usizo” mayelana nalokho okwenziwayo eningakwenza nomndeni wonke

SourceText: You can also just sit next to @fields.child_nickname while they are doing something they enjoy (like watching a T.V. show) and show them that you are interested in what they like. If you take their lead they will see that you care.

SourceText: Today's tip is about spending One-on-One Time with Our Children.
text: Nali lanamhlanje lokuchitha isikhathi senu nobabili nengane yakho!

SourceText: Children learn through play! Here is a comic about spending one-on-one time with your baby!
text: Izingane zifunda ngokudlala! Nansi ikhomikhi ngokuchitha isikhathi senu nobabili nengane yakho!

SourceText: Parent: "Such a strong baby you are."
text: Umzali: “Ungumntwana onamandla “

SourceText: Parent: "We are making a delicious meal together."
text: Umzali: “Senza ukudla okumnandi ndawonye.”

SourceText: Parent: “Here I am?”
text: Umzali: “Ngilapha?”

SourceText: Baby: "Ha ha ha!"
text: Ingane: "Ha ha ha!"

SourceText: Parent: "Wow! You have stacked 3 blocks on top of each other. Well done!"
text: Umzali: “Kwaze kwakuhle! Usupakishe amabhloksi ama-3 phezu kwalelo nalelo. Wenze kahle!”

SourceText: I know that you have already received this tip (well done!).Would you like to review it again?
text: Siyazi ukuthi usuvele ulitholile lelisu (wenze kahle).Ungathanda yini ukulibuyekeza futhi?

SourceText: Invest in One-on-One Time! The more time you spend with your children, the more likely they will listen to you and behave well at other times. It really works!
text: *Yenza amacebiso okuchitha isikhathi ninobabili! Uma uchitha isikhathi esiningi nezingane zakho, nzizokulalela kakhulu futhi ziziphathe kahle kwezinye izikhathi.  Kuyasebenza ngempela!

SourceText: That's okay! You can always type "Help" if you want to receive more tips about how to manage your child's behaviour.
text: Kulungile! Ungathayipha “Usizo” ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ufuna ukuthola amanye amasu mayelana nendlela yokulawula ukuziphatha kwengane yakho.

SourceText: The first 1000 days of life are a window of opportunity for your baby. It is when their brain develops faster than any other time in their life. When you spend time with your baby, you build a healthy attachment between you both that will make them feel secure and loved.
text: Izinsuku zokuqala eziyi-1000 zempilo ziyithuba elihle lengane yakho. Yingalesi sikhathi ubuchopho bayo buthuthuka masinyane ukudlula esinye isikhathi empilweni yayo. Uma uchitha isikhathi nengane yakho,usuke wakha ukuxhumana okuhle phakathi kwenu okwenza ingane yakho izizwe ivikelekile futhi ithandwa.

SourceText: Here are 7 easy tips to make One-on-One Time with your baby a success:
text: Nawa amasu ayi-7 okwenza isikhathi osichitha nengane yakho ninobabili sibe yimpumelelo:

SourceText: 1. Do it every day
text: 1. Kwenze nsuku zonke

SourceText: 2. Be close to your baby
text: 2. Sondelana nengane yakho

SourceText: 3. Let your baby take the lead
text: 3. Yekela ingane yakho ikuhole

SourceText: 4. Observe and listen to your child
text: 4. Lalela futhi uqaphele lokho okushiwo yingane yakho

SourceText: 5. Play with your baby
text: 5. Dlala nengane yakho

SourceText: 6. Talk to your baby
text: 6. Khuluma ane nengane yakho

SourceText: 7. You can have quality time with your baby anytime!
text: 7. Ungachitha isikhathi esanele nengane yakho noma nini!

SourceText: To learn more about one of these tips, type "1" to "7". You can also type "N" to move on.
text: Ukwazi kabanzi ngenye yalawa masu, thayipha “1” kuya ku- “7”. Ungathayipha  “N” ukuze uqhubekele phambili.

SourceText: 2. Be close to your child.
text: 2. Sondelana nengane yakho.

SourceText: Skin-to-skin contact is especially important for new-borns and infants. For older toddlers, make sure you are at the same level as they are.
text: Ukuthintana ngesikhumba phakathi komzali nengane yakhe, ikakhulukazi esandakuzalwa naleyo esencane.   Mayelana nabantwana asebakhulakhulile, yenza isiqinisekiso sokuthi uba sezingeni labo.

SourceText: Children need to do things in their own time. Try to give them time to explore and be patient. Remember that the world is brand new to your child!
text: Izingane zidinga ukuzenzela izinto ngesikhathi sazo. Zama ukuzinikeza isikhathi sokuzizamela ube nesineke. Khumbula ukuthi umhlaba usemusha sha enganeni yakho!

SourceText: Use words to describe actions, colours, shapes, numbers, sizes, textures, temperatures, tastes, sounds, and anything else that is happening. Speak with enthusiasm when describing what your child is doing. Here is a comic on how to communicate with your baby.
text: Sebenzisa amagama ukuchaza izenzo, imibala, izimo, izinombolo, osayizi, ukuthamba, amazinga okushisa, ukunambitha, imisindo, nanoma yini enye eyenzekayo. Khuluma ngentakaselo ngesikhathi uchaza lokho ingane yakho ekwenzayo. Nansi ikhomikhi emayelana nendlela yokukhuluma nomntwana wakho

SourceText: Parent: "You are such a beautiful person"
text: Umzali: “Ungumuntu omuhle”

SourceText: Parent: "Buh, buh, buh, big baby!"
text: Umzali: "Buh, buh, buh, umntwana omkhulu!"

SourceText: Baby: "Buh, buh, buh…"
text: Ingane: "Buh, buh, buh…"

SourceText: Parent: "And then there were two green parrots in the mango tree!"
text: Umzali: “Kwakukhona izinyoni ezimbili eziluhlaza njengotshani esihlahleni  sikamango!”

SourceText: Parent: "And now I am cleaning your toes, and your feet, and your knees…"
text: Umzali: “Manje sengihlanza izinzwane zakho, nezinyawo zakho, kanye namadolo akho...”

text: Sicela ukhethe enye inombolo uma ufuna ukufunda kabanzi ngokuthi usichitha kanjani isikhathi sakho nengane yakho ninobabili:

SourceText: It is normal for men of the family to struggle to think of what to do with their babies, especially when it seems they just eat, sleep, cry, poop, and repeat. It can be especially challenging when your baby is very young and not able to talk to you.
text: Kujwayelekile ukuthi amadoda omndeni athwale kanzima mayelana nokucabanga ngezinto angazenza nabantwana bawo, ikakhulukazi lapho kubonakala ukuthi bayadla , balale, bakhale, bakake bese kuphinda kube yiso sona leso futhi nsuku zonke. Kungaba nzima kakhulu ikakhulukazi uma umntwana wakho esasemncane kakhulu futhi engakakwazi ukukhuluma nawe

SourceText: Try to spend time playing with @fields.child_nickname every day for at least 20 minutes where you are giving them your full attention. Choose a time when you are unlikely to be interrupted. Switch off the television and put away phones.

SourceText: Give just enough help to let it be the child’s achievement. It is okay to play alongside and copy what they are doing but try to let them keep the initiative. If @fields.child_nickname gets frustrated, you can reassure @fields.child_nickname by gently stroking their back.

SourceText: Look for ways you can connect with your baby playfully during feeding, bathing, and dressing. You can even make bedtime a fun and nurturing experience for you and your baby in a calm way.

SourceText: Hi @fields.user_name! Have you tried sharing family responsibilities at home recently?
text: Sawubona @fields.user_name! Uke wazama ukuthi nisizane nomndeni ngokwenza imisebenzi yasekhaya kulezi zinsuku?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi! Have you tried sharing family responsibilities at home recently?
text: Sawubona! Uke wazama ukuthi nisizane nomndeni ngokwenza imisebenzi yasekhaya kulezi zinsuku?

SourceText: This can be hard to remember! Establishing a routine around caregiving or housework tasks can sometimes be helpful. This also lets you talk to your partner or other adults about how to share the workload.
text: Kunzima ukukukhumbula lokhu! Ukwenza uhlelo lwansuku zonke olumayelana nokunakekela noma nokwenziwa kwemisebenzi yasekhaya kungasiza ngesinye isikhathi. lokhu kwenza nokuthi ukhulume nophathina wakho noma abanye abantu abadala mayelana nokusizana ngemisebenzi yasekhaya.

SourceText: It is hard to remember to ask for help. Be kind to yourself if you forget to ask and try again another time. Asking for help and sharing family responsibilities benefits the whole family!
text: Akulula ukukhumbula ukucela usizo. Ungazehluleli uma ukhohlwa ukucela zama futhi ngesinye isikhathi. Ukucela usizo nokuthi nisizane ngemisebenzi emndenini kusiza wonke umndeni!

SourceText: It can be difficult to know how to ask for help. Try starting off with suggesting a task you would like help with. Being specific gives your partner a clearer idea of what they can support you with.
text: Kungase kube nzima ukuthi ungalucela kanjani usizo.  Zama ukuqala ngokuphakamisa umsebenzi ofisa ukusizwa kuwo. Uma ucacisa kahle uphathina wakho uzoqonda kahle ngalokho azokwazi ukukusiza ngakho.

SourceText: Trying something new can be hard! To make it easier, ask your partner to do it together with you the first few times. Soon you’ll feel more confident doing it on your own!
text: Ukuqala into entsha kungaba nzima. Ukuze kube lula, cela uphathina wakho ukuthi nikwenze ndawonye lokho izikhathi ezimbalwa zokuqala. Kungesikhathi esingakanani uzobe usuzethemba ngokwenza lokho uwedwa ngokwakho!

SourceText: Talk to them! Talking with your partner about how you can share family responsibilities helps both of you understand each other better. It also shows that you care!
text: Khuluma nabo! Ukukhuluma nophathina wakho mayelana nokuthi uma nibambisana ekwenzeni imisebenzi yasekhaya kwenza ukuthi niqondane kangcono. Lokhu kukhombisa nokuthi unendaba!

SourceText: It can be difficult to find time during the day sometimes! Can you think of a time when your partner might be less busy, such as early in the morning or later in the evening? Creating a routine around housework can also be helpful.
text: Kwesinye isikhathi akukho lula ukuthola isikhathi osukwini! Ungacabanga ngesikhathi sosuku lapho wena nophathina wakho ningekho matasa kakhulu, njengasekuseni noma  kusihlwa? Ukwenza uhlelo lwansuku zonke mayelana nomsebenzi wasekhaya kungasiza kakhulu.

SourceText: Sharing responsibilities in the home benefits everyone! While trying something new can feel hard at first, soon you will start to feel more comfortable. If it helps, ask your partner to join you in the beginning!
text: Ukusizana ngemisebenzi yasekhaya kusiza wonke umuntu! Ukuzama ukwenza into entsha akulula ekuqaleni, kodwa emva kwesikhashana uzoqala ukukhululeka ekwenzeni lokhu. Kuyasiza, cela ukuthi uphathina wakho akujoyine ekuqaleni!

SourceText: Excellent job @fields.user_name! Sharing the workload benefits the whole family. How was your experience?
text: Wenze umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu @fields.user_name! Ukusizana ngomsebenzi kuhlomulisa wonke umndeni. Kwenzekeni kuwe?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: How did you find out about ParentText?
text: Uzwe ngoba mayelana ne-ParentText?

SourceText: Stand up and stretch your arms up to the sky. Push away any clouds and let the Sunshine of Positive Attention shine down on you. Stretch to both sides. Stretch to the front and to the back.
text: Yima bese ulula izingalo zibheke phezulu esibhakabhakeni. Sunduza amafu ngenhloso yokwenza ukuthi Ilanga Likukhanyise. Zelule kuzo zombili izinhlangothi. Zilulele phambili nasemuva.

SourceText: Place one foot in front of the other and make small circles from your ankles. Remember to turn your foot to both sides - to the left and then to the right. Do each foot with four circles in each direction.
text: Beka unyawo olulodwa phambi kolunye bese ujikajikisa amaqakala.  Khumbula ukujikisela unyawo lwakho kuzo zombili izinhlangothi - ngakwesokunxele nangakwesokudla. Yenza lokho onyaweni ngalunye ngezindilinga ezine ohlangothini ngalunye.

SourceText: Let your hand hang by your side. As you breathe in, squeeze your shoulders up to your ears, scrunch your eyes, and hold your breath. Release your shoulders as you breathe out and relax your body.
text: Lengisa isandla sakho eceleni. Ngesikhathi udonsa umoya, cindezela amahlombe akhuphuke afike ezindlebeni bese ucimeza ngokuqinisa amehlo, bese ubamba umoya. Yehlisa amahlombe akho ngesikhathi udedela umoya bese udedela nomzimba wakh .

SourceText: Close your eyes and raise your arms slowly above your head as you breathe in. Lower your arms slowly to your side as you breathe out. Repeat 4 times.
text: Vala amehlo akho bese uphakamise izingalo zakho kancane kancane ziye ngaphezu kwekhanda lakho njengoba udonsa umoya. Yehlisela izingalo zakho ohlangothini kancane kancane njengoba ukhipha umoya. Phinda lokhu izikhathi ezi-4.

SourceText: Relax your arms and let them swing to the front and back. Take 4 deep breaths while you do this. This is good for your lower back.
text: Dedela izingalo zakho bese uzishwibisa ziye phambili nasemuva Donsa umoya bese uwudedela kancane izikhathi ezi-4 ngesikhathi ushwibisa izingalo zakho phambili nasemuva. Lokhu kulungele kahle ingxenye ezansi nomhlane wakho.

SourceText: Relax your arms and let your arms swing sideways as you turn your upper body. Your arms should gently hit your back as you twist from side to side.
text: Khulula izingalo zakho futhi uzishwibisa emaceleni ngesikhathi uphenduka ngengxenye engenhla yomzimba wakho. Izingalo zakho kufanele zishaye kancane umgogodla wakho njengoba utshikiza, ujikajika.

SourceText: Take a moment to reflect on your experience. Remember that you can do this activity at any time whenever you feel like you need to release stress and energise your mind and body.
text: Zinike isikhathi sokucabanga ngokwenzeke kuwe. Khumbula ukuthi lokhu ungakwenza noma nini lapho uzizwa kunesidingo sokukhipha ukucindezeleka nokufaka umdlandla engqondweni nasemzimbeni.

note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Hi! Have you tried resolving conflict in a calm way even when you have felt frustrated recently?
text: Sawubona! Usuke wazama ukuxazulula ukungezwani ngomoya ophansi noma ngabe ubuzizwa ukhungathekile kulezi zinsuku?

SourceText: Sorry to hear this. What was difficult for you about resolving conflicts between you and your partner?
text: Siyaxolisa ngokuzwa lokhu. Yikuphi obekunzima kuwe mayelan nokuxazulula ukungezwani phakathi kwakho nophathina wakho?

SourceText: It can be really hard to stay calm when we’re having a disagreement with others. Try to think of something that you can do that might help like taking a couple deep breaths.
text: Akulula neze ukwehlisa umoya uma kukhona ukungavumelani nabanye abantu. Zama ukucabanga into ongayenza engakusiza, njengokudonsa umoya kakhulu bese uwudedela kancane izikhathi ezimbalwa.

SourceText: It can be easy to forget, but don’t give up! Next time when you start feeling angry, try taking a deep breath before responding. You can also try walking away for a bit if you start feeling frustrated.
text: Kulula ukukhohlwa , kodwa ungayeki!  Ngesinye isikhathi uma uzizwa uthukuthele, zama ukudonsa umoya kakhulu bese uwudedela kancane ngaphambi kokuphendula. Ungazama nokuthi usuke kancane kuleyo ndawo uma uqala ukuzizwa ukhungathekile.

SourceText: By taking a pause before responding, it can help us stay calm and respond better. When you feel yourself getting angry, try taking a pause. You can do this!
text: Uma uthatha ikhefu ngaphambi kokuphendula, kuyasisiza ukuthi sikwazi ukwehlisa umoya bese siphendula ngendlela engcono. Uma uzizwa ukuthi sengathi uyathukuthela zama ukudonsa ukuthatha ikhefu.  Ungakwazi ukukwenza lokhu!

SourceText: Sometimes others respond to us negatively when we’re having a disagreement. In these situations, it is sometimes best to walk away for a bit until those involved have calmed down.
text: Ngesinye isikhathi abanye abantu baphendula ngendlela engeyinhle uma kukhona ukungavumelani. Kulezi zimo, kuyinto enhle kakhulu ukuthi uvele usuke kuleyo ndawo isikhashana kufikela labo bantu ababandakanyekayo sebewehlisile umoya.

SourceText: Here are 5 simple tips on how you can develop a loving and peaceful relationship with your partner:

text: 1. Thathanani sengathi niyalingana

SourceText: 2. Become a confident father and a supportive partner
text: 2. Yiba ngubaba ozethembayo futhi ube nguphathina owesekayo

text: 3. Sizanani ngomsebenzi wasekhaya

text: 5. Lalelanani nikhulumisane

SourceText: How can we help you?
text: Singakusiza ngani?

SourceText: Did you manage to establish ONE rule or daily routine together with @fields.child_nickname?
text: Ukwazile yini ukusungula umthetho OWODWA noma uhlelo lwansuku zonke ngokubambisana ne@fields.child_nickname?
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Did you manage to establish ONE rule or daily routine together with your child or teen ?
text: Ukwazile yini ukusungula umthetho OWODWA noma uhlelo lwansuku zonke ngokubambisana nengane yakho noma nengane yakho esiyintsha?

SourceText: Great to hear it this! Remember, the more we involve our children in setting rules, the more our children will be likely to follow them!
text: Siyajabula ukuzwa lokhu! Khumbula ukuthi uma sibandakanya izingane zethu kakhulu ekwenziweni kwemithetho, izingane zethu zizoyilandela!

SourceText: Did you have any challenges when trying to establish a rule or routine together?
text: Ingabe ube nobunzima obuthile lapho uzama ukusungula umthetho noma ukusungula uhlelo lwansuku zonke ndawonye?

SourceText: It is always important when establishing rules and routines  as a family to consider the age of each child, so you can come up with age-appropriate routines. This is most important for bedtime, time to come home/play, household chores.
text: Kubalulekile ukuthi uma kusungulwa imithetho kanye nezinhlelo zansuku zonke nibambisene nomndeni nicabange ngeminyaka yobudala yaleyo naleyo ngane, ukuze nikwazi ukuhlela izinhlelo ezifanele leyo minyaka yobudala.  Lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu mayelana nesikhathi sokulala, nesikhathi sokufika ekhaya/emdlalweni, imisebenzi yasekhaya.

SourceText: We should always remember that children learn best from us. The more we follow the rules, they more they will follow the rules too. You can adjust the rule to make sure that it is realistic for everyone to follow it, considering their responsibilities (for example school or work activities).
text: Kufanele sikhumbule njalo ukuthi izingane zifunda kangcono kithi. Uma silandela imithetho, kuba lula kuzo ukulandela imithetho. Ungawushintsha umthetho ukuze uqinisekise ukuthi wonke umuntu uyakwazi ukuwulandela, ube ucabangela imisebenzi yabo (ngokwesibonelo, imisebenzi yesikole noma eyasemsebenzini).

SourceText: When we establish rules together with our children or teens, that helps the family to understand each other better. The rules will be more realistic and our children will be more willing and able to follow the rule.
text: Uma sisungula imithetho ndawonye nezingane zethu noma nentsha yethu, lokho kusiza umndeni uqondane kangcono. Imithetho kuyoba lula ukuyilandela futhi izingane zethu zizoba nentakaselo futhi zizokwazi ukuwulandela.

SourceText: When we establish rules together with our children, that helps the family to understand each other better. The rules will be more realistic and our children will be more willing and able to follow the rule.
text: Lapho sisungula imithetho ndawonye nezingane zethu, lokho kusiza umndeni uqondane kangcono. Imithetho kuyoba lula ukuyilandela futhi izingane zethu zizoba nentakaselo futhi zizokwazi ukuwulandela.

SourceText: Sorry you did not manage to do this yet. Sit down with @fields.child_nickname and try again today - involving your children will make them want to follow the rule more often!
text: Siyaxolisa awukwazanga ukwenza lokhu. Hlala phansi @fields.child_nicknamebese uzama futhi namhlanje - uma ubandakanya izingane zakho, lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi ziwulandele umthetho kakhulu!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry you did not manage to do this yet. Sit down with your child or teen  and try again today - involving your children will make them want to follow the rule more often!
text: Siyaxolisa awukwazanga ukwenza lokhu. Hlala phansi nengane yakho noma nengane yakho eyintsha bese uzama futhi namhlanje - uma ubandakanya izingane zakho, lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi ziwulandele umthetho kakhulu!

SourceText: What was difficult for you about establishing a rule or routine with @fields.child_nickname?
text: Yikuphi okube nzima kuwe mayelana nokusungula umthetho noma uhlelo lwansuku zonke @fields.child_nickname
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: What was difficult for you about establishing a rule or routine with your child or teen ?
text: Yikuphi okube nzima kuwe mayelana nokusungula umthetho noma uhlelo lwansuku zonke nengane yakho noma nengane yakho eyintsha

SourceText: Amazing! Consistent rules and routines help make @fields.child_nickname feel secure. They also keep them safe!
text: Kuyamangalisa! Imithetho nohlelo lwansuku zonke okungaguquki kusiza ukwenza @fields.child_nickname izizwe ivikelekile.  Futhi izigcina ziphephile!
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Amazing! Consistent rules and routines help make your child or teen  feel secure. They also keep them safe!
text: Kuyamangalisa! Imithetho nohlelo lwansuku zonke okungaguquki kusiza ukwenza ingane yakho noma ingane yakho eyintsha izizwe ivikelekile.  Futhi izigcina ziphephile!

SourceText: The sound of a baby crying can be very distressing, especially for a father It is completely natural to want to make it stop. You might also think that you are not a good parent or that your baby is crying to spite you. But all babies cry. It is one of the main ways a baby can tell you that something is wrong.
text: Umsindo wengane ekhalayo ubanga usizi, ikakhulukazi kubaba. Kuyimvelo ngokuphelele ukuthi afise ukuyenza ukuthi ithule.  Ingakwenza nokuthi ucabange ukuthi awuyena umzali oqotho  noma ingane yakho ikhala ngoba ifuna ukukulaya. Kodwa zonke izingane ziyakhala. Le yindlela eyodwa kwezisemqoka umntwana azama ukukutshela ngayo ukuthi kukhona okungalungile.

SourceText: The sound of a baby crying can be very distressing, especially for a mother. It is completely natural to want to make it stop. You might also think that you are not a good parent or that your baby is crying to spite you. But all babies cry. It is one of the main ways a baby can tell you that something is wrong.
text: Umsindo wengane ekhalayo ungakubangela usizi, ikakhulukazi kumama. Kuyimvelo ngokuphelele ukuthi afune ukuthi iyeke ukukhala. Ingakwenza nokuthi ucabange ukuthi awuyena umzali oqotho  noma ingane yakho ikhala ngoba ifuna ukukulaya. Kodwa zonke izingane ziyakhala. Le yindlela eyodwa kwezisemqoka umntwana azama ukukutshela ngayo ukuthi kukhona okungalungile.

SourceText: The sound of a baby crying can be very distressing, especially for a parent. It is completely natural to want to make it stop. You might also think that you are not a good parent or that your baby is crying to spite you. But all babies cry. It is one of the main ways a baby can tell you that something is wrong.
text: Umsindo wengane ekhalayo ungakubangela usizi, ikakhulukazi kumzali. Kuyimvelo ngokuphelele ukuthi afune ukuthi iyeke ukukhala. Ingakwenza nokuthi ucabange ukuthi awuyena umzali oqotho  noma ingane yakho ikhala ngoba ifuna ukukulaya. Kodwa zonke izingane ziyakhala. Le yindlela eyodwa kwezisemqoka umntwana azama ukukutshela ngayo ukuthi kukhona okungalungile.

SourceText: I know that you have already received this tip (well done!). Would you like to review it again?
text: Ngiyazi ukuthi usuvele ulitholile lelisu (wenze kahle). Ungathanda yini ukukubuyekeza futhi?

SourceText: 2 Truths, 1 Lie
text: 2 Amaqiniso, 1 Amanga

SourceText: Think of three statements about yourself. Two must be true and one must be a lie.
text: Cabanga ngezitatimende ezintathu mayelana nawe. Ezimbili kumelwe zibe yiqiniso bese esisodwa sibe amanga.

SourceText: It might help to think of wishes, dreams, likes or dislikes. For example, I hate bananas, I love ice cream and I really wish I could sing.
text: Kungasiza ukucabanga ngezifiso, ngamaphupho, ngenikubona esikoleni, ngenikuthandayo noma ngeningakuthandi. Isibonelo, ngiyawuzonda ubhanana, ngiyawuthanda i-ice cream futhi ngifisa sengathi ngingacula.

SourceText: Say them to your partner or friends. Ask them to guess which one is a lie.
text: Yisho lokhu kuphathina wakho noma kubangane bakho. Bacele baqagele ukuthi yikuphi okungamanga.

SourceText: Did they guess correctly? Was it a surprise?
text: Ingabe baqagele ngokunembile? Ingabe bekuyinto engalindelekile?

SourceText: Now ask them to do the same. Did you learn something new about each other?
text: Manje bacele ukuthi benze okufanayo. Ingabe kukhona okusha enikufundile ngomunye nomunye?

SourceText: Crazy Chicken
text: Inkukhu Ehlanyayo

SourceText: Shake your hand in the air 8 times while counting to 8
text: Nyakazisa isandla sakho sokunxele izikhathi eziyi-8 emoyeni ngesikhathi ubala kasi-8

SourceText: Do it as fast and loud as you can
text: Kwenze ngokushesha futhi kuzwakale kakhulu.

SourceText: Repeat with your other hand and both feet
text: Yenza futhi nangesinye isandla kanye nangezinyawo zakho zombili

SourceText: Do it 7 times, then 6 times until you get to 1.
text: Yenza izikhathi eziyi-7, bese wenza izikhathi eziyi-6 uqhubeke njalo uze ufike ku-1.

SourceText: Call out “Crazy chicken” as loud as you can!
text: Memeza kakhulu ngokusemandleni akho uthi “Inkukhu ehlanyayo!

SourceText: Have you released all your stress? If not, do it again even faster and louder!
text: Usukukhiphe konke okukucindezelayo?  Uma kungenjalo, kuphinde futhi kodwa usheshe futhi umemeze kakhudlwana manje!

SourceText: Family Work Out
text: Ukuzivocavoca Komndeni

SourceText: Choose a sport or exercise to do together
text: Khetha umdlalo noma ukuzivocavoca eningakwenza ndawonye.

SourceText: Decide on a schedule. Are you going to do it every day? For how long?
text: Vumelanani ngohlelo. Ingabe nizokwenza nsuku zonke? Isikhathi esingakanani?

SourceText: Try it out for a week.
text: Kuzameni isonto elilodwa.

SourceText: At the end of the week, ask yourself and your family these questions. How’s it going? How did you feel at the start of the week? How do you feel at the end of the week? What can we do differently next week?
text: Ekupheleni kwesonto, zibuze wena kanye nomndeni wakho le mibuzo: Kuhamba kanjani? Ubuzizwa unjani ekuqaleni kwesonto? Uzizwe kanjani ekupheleni kwesonto? Yini esingayenza ngendlela ehlukile esontweni elilandelayo?

SourceText: COVID-19 has interrupted our children's education with school closures and remote learning. It is normal to feel overwhelmed about to do this alone, especially when we also have stress about work and money.
text: I-COVID-19 iphazamise imfundo yezingane zethu njengoba bekuvalwe izikole kufundelwa emakhaya. Kujwayelekile ukuzizwa ukhungathekile ngenxa yokwenza lokhu uwedwa, ikakhulukazi uma sicindezelekile ngenxa yomsebenzi nemali.

SourceText: Would you like to learn more about how to support your children with remote learning and returning to school?
text: Ungathanda yini ukufunda kabanzi ngendlela ongasiza ngayo izingane zakho ngohlelo lokufundela ekhaya nangokubuyela esikoleni?

SourceText: Stop & Listen
text: Yima bese Ulalela

SourceText: • Stop for a moment and close your eyes.
text: • Yima kancane bese uvala amehlo.

SourceText: • How many sounds can you hear? Listen to sounds inside and outside the room. Count them on your fingers. (Pause for 10 seconds)
text: • Mingaki imisindo okwazi ukuyizwa? Lalela imisindo engaphakathi nengaphandle kwegumbi. Yibale ngeminywe yakho. (Yima imizuzwana engo-10)

SourceText: • How many fingers do you have up? What sounds did you hear?
text: • Mingaki iminwe oyimisile? Yimiphi imisindo oyizwile?

SourceText: • Let’s try again. Can you hear any new sounds this time? Can you hear any sounds inside your own body? (Pause for 10 seconds)
text: • Masizame futhi. Kukhona umsindo omusha owuzwayo manje? Ingabe ikhona imisindo oyizwile engaphakathi komzimba wakho? (Yima imizuzwana engo-10)

SourceText: • Open your eyes. What new sounds did you hear?
text: • Vula amehlo akho. Yimiphi imisindo emisha oyizwile?

SourceText: A Short Pause
text: Yima kancane

SourceText: Sit down and close your eyes.
text: Hlala phansi bese uvala amehlo akho.

SourceText: Listen to your breath as it goes in and out.
text: Lalela ukuphefumula kwakho njengoba udonsa umoya uphinde uwukhiphe.

SourceText: Notice how you feel.
text: Qaphela indlela ozizwa ngayo.

SourceText: Take a few more deep breaths.
text: Yithi ukuphefumula futhi kaningana

SourceText: When you are ready open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?
text: Lapho usukulungele phinde uvule amehlo akho. Ingabe ukhona umehluko owuzwayo?
